typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		EID as string,
		EName as string,
		ESalary as string,
		EAddress as string,
		ModifiedDate as string,
		DeptID as string,
		insert_date as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 split(equals(EAddress, 'Hyd'),
	equals(EAddress, 'Pune'),
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(HydSplit, PuneSplit, Default)
ConditionalSplit1@HydSplit sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		EID as string,
		EName as string,
		ESalary as string,
		EAddress as string,
		ModifiedDate as string,
		DeptID as string,
		insert_date as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['HydSplitEmp.txt'],
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
ConditionalSplit1@PuneSplit sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		EID as string,
		EName as string,
		ESalary as string,
		EAddress as string,
		ModifiedDate as string,
		DeptID as string,
		insert_date as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['PuneSplitEmp.txt'],
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink2
ConditionalSplit1@Default sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		EID as string,
		EName as string,
		ESalary as string,
		EAddress as string,
		ModifiedDate as string,
		DeptID as string,
		insert_date as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['DefaultSplitEmp.txt'],
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink3
